Player History

Injured on 7/23/2005 with a Bruised Neck, out for 4 days...

Traded from Boston to Los Angeles on 2/26/2008 (Going to LA: P R. Rubio. Going to BOS: P D. Webb)...
Injured on 5/11/2010 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 8/18/2020 with a Torn Ligament Elbow, out for full season...

Injured on 7/19/1977 with a Broken Foot, out for 5-6 weeks...

Injured on 4/24/1982 with a Pulled Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...

Hit first career homerun on 5/10/1984, off Steve Howe (PIT)...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago (N) on 9/26/1984...
Injured on 5/5/1985 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Houston on 10/3/1988...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/18/1989 with a Bruised Ribs, out for one week...
